ProductInfo.Features:
Affordable day night vision outdoor security camera. Can be mounted on wall and ceiling
Image Sensor: Color CMOS. Horizontal Resolution: 420 TV Lines
IR Illuminators: 36 Infrared LEDs. Camera Lens: 6.0mm
Aluminum housing for indoor outdoor application. Metal body housing, mount and sun shade
Package included: 8 x bullet cameras, 8 x metal brackets, 2 x DC 12V 4 channel power supplies and 8 x security warning stickers
ProductInfo.Name: VideoSecu 8 x Outdoor Home Video IR Day Night Vision CCTV Color Bullet Security Cameras 420TVL 36 Infrared LEDs for DVR Surveillance System with Power Supplies and Free Security Warning Stickers WJ4
